signUpParagraph: Hello!<1></1>You're one step away from joining La Brújula. Create your user, add your information, and connect with other industry members.<3></3><4></4>We want you to be a part of La Brújula.
Tienes que tener al menos una actividad: You need to register at least one activity
Por favor contáctenos, no debería pasar: Please reach out, this should not happen
Nombre con el que quieres aparecer: Name you want to appear with
Escribe aquí las características que te: Write briefly about which characteristics best describe your role in the industry
Escribe aquí a que asociaciones de la in: List the associations inside the industry you belong to
Escribe aquí las certificaciones que has: List the relevant certifications you have completed
Escribe aquí los reconocimientos que has: List relevant awards or accolades you have received
¿Te interesa ser becario o hacer servici: Are you interested in pro-bono work or an internship?
